Issue 177 – June 2021
Cover Art
Companion
Derek Stenning is a concept artist working in the game development field. His personal work, Entartete Kunst (EK), is available as prints and resin model kits. His second art book, EK2 - The Lost Years, is to be published in 2022 by Design Studio Press.

div.p: ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
